title: Techno
brief_description: Presented in a magazine-style fomat, with excellent pupil notes, “Techno” aims to stimulate 11-14 years olds in the areas of design and technology. Using a problem-solving approach, with “real world” examples, the programs give necessary background information and guidance on how to solve these. Curriculum areas covered by these programs include graphic communication, woodcraft, textiles, materials such as plastic and metal, and basic engineering concepts.
